actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend an act entitled "An Act Granting a Charter to the General Federation of Women's Clubs."

summary.text: Revises Federal law granting a charter to the General Federation of Women's Clubs to provide that the corporation is authorized to acquire, by devise, bequest, or otherwise, hold, purchase, and convey such real and personal estate as shall or may be required for the purpose of its incorporation with authority in said corporation, should it be by it deemed necessary so to do, to mortgage or otherwise encumber the real estate which it may hereafter own or acquire and may give therefor such evidences of indebtedness as such corporation may decide upon.

titles.title: A bill to amend an act entitled "An Act Granting a Charter to the General Federation of Women's Clubs."
